sandbox_limitations.business_policy_eligibility: Sandbox accounts not eligible for Business Policy (Error 20403)
sandbox_limitations.account_api_restrictions: Account API fulfillment policy creation restricted in sandbox
sandbox_limitations.testing_approach: eBay recommends Trading API for sandbox testing without full business policy access

alternative_approaches.trading_api_recommended: eBay AI chatbot recommends Trading API (AddItem, ReviseItem) instead of Inventory API
alternative_approaches.direct_shipping_config: Trading API allows embedded shipping details bypassing business policy requirements
alternative_approaches.required_fields: title, category, price, condition, shipping, return policy can be specified directly

sandbox_vs_production.sandbox_purpose: API testing and development with limited seller privileges
sandbox_vs_production.production_capabilities: Full business policy creation and management available
sandbox_vs_production.environment_isolation: Production policies not accessible in sandbox by design

trading_api_implementation.authentication_method: Uses existing OAuth tokens from REST API authentication

bypass_mechanism.inventory_api_limitation: Requires business policies not available in sandbox
bypass_mechanism.trading_api_solution: Direct item creation with embedded shipping/return policies
bypass_mechanism.no_policy_dependency: Trading API does not require pre-created business policies

trading_api_implementation.approach: Trading API with direct shipping configuration
trading_api_implementation.bypass_mechanism: Embedded shipping/return policies without business policy dependency

flipsync_integration.production_ready_code: Trading API implementation ready for production deployment
flipsync_integration.integration_approach: Trading API as final 5% solution for listing publication
